H0.text: Which manager bought Trevor Francis thereby turning him into the first million pound footballer. Brian Clough's predecessor at Nottingham Forest, Jimmy Murphy

H1.text: Which manager bought Trevor Francis thereby turning him into the first million pound footballer. Ron Atkinson

H2.text: Which manager bought Trevor Francis thereby turning him into the first million pound footballer. Lawrie McMenemy

H3.text: Which manager bought Trevor Francis thereby turning him into the first million pound footballer. Cloughie

A4.text: Nottingham Forest, the reigning First Division champions and League Cup holders managed by Brian Clough, put in a bid for Francis which totalled just over £1 million.

A5.text: In February 1979, Taylor authorised the English game's first £1 million transfer signing Trevor Francis from Birmingham City.
